channel.title: Crashing 1 minute after launch
channel.description: Hi, I encountered a weird and very annoying issue. Been playing Black Mesa just fine last night and before, up until Chapter 5 "We've got hostiles". No issues, no crashes, nothing. Then today, I start the game and the game crashes 1 minute after. No matter what I do, it always crashes after 1 minute. I can load an old save, start a new game, it ALWAYS crashes. I rebooted my system, no difference. What the hell is going on? It was fine yesterday. This is extremely frustrating because I've loved the game so far.

item.title: Crashing 1 minute after launch
item.dc:creator: doozer
item.description:
I have the exact same problem.

Can you tell me which ini files you altered and how you did it?

Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Crashing 1 minute after launch
item.dc:creator: johnkimble
item.description:
Okay, SOMEHOW the problem solved itself. All I did now was mess around abit with the settings. Changed resolution, played with some of the settings in the ini files. It might be a coincidence though. This weird error came out of nowhere and vanished into nowhere, which is just as weird…

Read full topic

item.title: Crashing 1 minute after launch
item.dc:creator: johnkimble
item.description:
Hi, I encountered a weird and very annoying issue. Been playing Black Mesa just fine last night and before, up until Chapter 5 “We’ve got hostiles”. No issues, no crashes, nothing.
Then today, I start the game and the game crashes 1 minute after. No matter what I do, it always crashes after 1 minute. I can load an old save, start a new game, it ALWAYS crashes. I rebooted my system, no difference.
What the hell is going on? It was fine yesterday.
This is extremely frustrating because I’ve loved the game so far.
